content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":269544,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お、おお……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"O-oh...\""},{"lineNumber":269545,"originalJapaneseLine":"　勝った」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"We won.\""},{"lineNumber":269546,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……のか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Did we?\""},{"lineNumber":269547,"originalJapaneseLine":"「う、動かなくは、なりましたね？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"U-uh, it seems they’ve stopped moving, right?\""},{"lineNumber":269548,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ありがとう、ランス君。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Thank you, Rance-kun."},{"lineNumber":269549,"originalJapaneseLine":"　後は私がやるわ」","translatedEnglishLine":"I'll take care of the rest.\""},{"lineNumber":269550,"originalJapaneseLine":"「は？　後はやるって、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh? Take care of the rest?,"},{"lineNumber":269551,"originalJapaneseLine":"　お、おい、いったい何を……」","translatedEnglishLine":"H-hey, just what exactly are you planning to...\""},{"lineNumber":269552,"originalJapaneseLine":"ラ・バスワルドは、","translatedEnglishLine":"La Baswald,"},{"lineNumber":269553,"originalJapaneseLine":"自分の現状が理解出来ない。","translatedEnglishLine":"could not comprehend their current condition."},{"lineNumber":269554,"originalJapaneseLine":"体が動かない。","translatedEnglishLine":"Their body wouldn’t move."},{"lineNumber":269555,"originalJapaneseLine":"回復を優先させる他ない。","translatedEnglishLine":"There was no choice but to prioritize recovery."},{"lineNumber":269556,"originalJapaneseLine":"しかし、回復の為に、","translatedEnglishLine":"However, for the sake of recovery,"},{"lineNumber":269557,"originalJapaneseLine":"体を動かすことすら出来ずにいた。","translatedEnglishLine":"they couldn’t even move their body."},{"lineNumber":269558,"originalJapaneseLine":"と――","translatedEnglishLine":"And then—"},{"lineNumber":269559,"originalJapaneseLine":"視界の片隅に、","translatedEnglishLine":"In the corner of their vision,"},{"lineNumber":269560,"originalJapaneseLine":"上半身だけの異形のものが、","translatedEnglishLine":"a monstrous figure, only a torso,"},{"lineNumber":269561,"originalJapaneseLine":"よちよちと姿を見せた。","translatedEnglishLine":"wobbled into view."},{"lineNumber":269562,"originalJapaneseLine":"そして化け物は笑い、一言だけ喋る――","translatedEnglishLine":"And the monster smiled, speaking only one word—"},{"lineNumber":269563,"originalJapaneseLine":"『こんにちは』","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hello\""},{"lineNumber":269564,"originalJapaneseLine":"たった一言で無惨にも意識が刈り取られる。","translatedEnglishLine":"That single word cruelly shredded their consciousness."},{"lineNumber":269565,"originalJapaneseLine":"――それはガリガリと、","translatedEnglishLine":"—It was like a grating,"},{"lineNumber":269566,"originalJapaneseLine":"魂が削られるような声だった。","translatedEnglishLine":"voice scraping away their soul."},{"lineNumber":269567,"originalJapaneseLine":"…………","translatedEnglishLine":"........."},{"lineNumber":269568,"originalJapaneseLine":"……","translatedEnglishLine":"..."},{"lineNumber":269569,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、も、戻ってきた……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, I-I’m coming back...\""},{"lineNumber":269570,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だ、大丈夫……でしょうか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"A-are you... alright?\""},{"lineNumber":269571,"originalJapaneseLine":"「大丈夫よ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I’m fine."},{"lineNumber":269572,"originalJapaneseLine":"　もう無害化したから」","translatedEnglishLine":"They’ve been rendered harmless now.\""},{"lineNumber":269573,"originalJapaneseLine":"アムがラ・バスワルドに抱えられながら","translatedEnglishLine":"Amu appeared, carried by La Baswald,"},{"lineNumber":269574,"originalJapaneseLine":"その場に現れた。","translatedEnglishLine":"right there on the spot."},{"lineNumber":269575,"originalJapaneseLine":"「君……もしかして……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You... Could it be..."},{"lineNumber":269576,"originalJapaneseLine":"　自分一人でもなんとか","translatedEnglishLine":"that you managed somehow on your own?"},{"lineNumber":269577,"originalJapaneseLine":"　出来たのと違うか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Isn’t that right?\""},{"lineNumber":269578,"originalJapaneseLine":"「というか説得できるなら、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I mean, if you could persuade them,"},{"lineNumber":269579,"originalJapaneseLine":"　最初からせんかー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"why didn’t you do it from the start!\""},{"lineNumber":269580,"originalJapaneseLine":"「違う違う。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No, no."},{"lineNumber":269581,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ランス君が無力化したから、","translatedEnglishLine":"Because Rance-kun was incapacitated,"},{"lineNumber":269582,"originalJapaneseLine":"　私の説得が届いたのよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"my persuasion was able to reach them.\""},{"lineNumber":269583,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……ということにしておいて。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Let’s just say that."},{"lineNumber":269584,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あんまり目立ちたくないの、私」","translatedEnglishLine":"I don’t really want to stand out too much.\""},{"lineNumber":269585,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ね？　やっぱり、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"See? After all,"},{"lineNumber":269586,"originalJapaneseLine":"　世界を救ったのはランス君なのよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"it was Rance-kun who saved the world.\""},{"lineNumber":269587,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……煙に巻かれてる気がする」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...I feel like you’re trying to pull the wool over my eyes.\""},{"lineNumber":269588,"originalJapaneseLine":"「くすくす……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hehe...\""},{"lineNumber":269589,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふふ、それにしても可愛い子……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Fufu, what a cute child..."},{"lineNumber":269590,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それに、とても良い子」","translatedEnglishLine":"And such a good kid.\""},{"lineNumber":269591,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":269592,"originalJapaneseLine":"アムがラ・バスワルドの頬を、","translatedEnglishLine":"Amu gently stroked La Baswald’s cheek,"},{"lineNumber":269593,"originalJapaneseLine":"愛おしげに撫でる。","translatedEnglishLine":"with affection."},{"lineNumber":269594,"originalJapaneseLine":"「こういう子が、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"This is the kind of child"},{"lineNumber":269595,"originalJapaneseLine":"　一人くらい欲しかったところなの」","translatedEnglishLine":"I’ve always wanted at least one of.\""},{"lineNumber":269596,"originalJapaneseLine":"「………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...\""},{"lineNumber":269597,"originalJapaneseLine":"「もらっていい？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Can I have them?\""},{"lineNumber":269598,"originalJapaneseLine":"「駄ーー目ーーだーー！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"N-nooo! That’s not allowed!\""},{"lineNumber":269599,"originalJapaneseLine":"　返しなさい！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Give them back!\""},{"lineNumber":269600,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はーい」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Okaaay.\""},{"lineNumber":269601,"originalJapaneseLine":"「アムちゃん、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Amu-chan,"},{"lineNumber":269602,"originalJapaneseLine":"　とっとと命令なりなんなりして、","translatedEnglishLine":"hurry up and give some orders or whatever,"},{"lineNumber":269603,"originalJapaneseLine":"　元に戻ってもらえ」","translatedEnglishLine":"and get them back to normal.\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「う、動かなくは、なりましたね？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "U-uh, it seems they’ve stopped moving, right?"
I'll take care of the rest."
H-hey, just what exactly are you planning to..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自分の現状が理解出来ない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: could not comprehend their current condition.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 回復を優先させる他ない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There was no choice but to prioritize recovery.
However, for the sake of recovery,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 体を動かすことすら出来ずにいた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: they couldn’t even move their body.
In the corner of their vision,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 上半身だけの異形のものが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a monstrous figure, only a torso,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よちよちと姿を見せた。
そして化け物は笑い、一言だけ喋る――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And the monster smiled, speaking only one word—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: たった一言で無惨にも意識が刈り取られる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That single word cruelly shredded their consciousness.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魂が削られるような声だった。
アムがラ・バスワルドに抱えられながら
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Amu appeared, carried by La Baswald,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自分一人でもなんとか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: that you managed somehow on your own?
"I mean, if you could persuade them,
why didn’t you do it from the start!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス君が無力化したから、
私の説得が届いたのよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: my persuasion was able to reach them."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あんまり目立ちたくないの、私」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don’t really want to stand out too much."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 世界を救ったのはランス君なのよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it was Rance-kun who saved the world."
"...I feel like you’re trying to pull the wool over my eyes."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふふ、それにしても可愛い子……
アムがラ・バスワルドの頬を、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Amu gently stroked La Baswald’s cheek,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一人くらい欲しかったところなの」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I’ve always wanted at least one of."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とっとと命令なりなんなりして、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: hurry up and give some orders or whatever,
and get them back to normal."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「う、動かなくは、なりましたね？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "U-uh, it seems they’ve stopped moving, right?"
I'll take care of the rest."
H-hey, just what exactly are you planning to..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自分の現状が理解出来ない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: could not comprehend their current condition.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 回復を優先させる他ない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There was no choice but to prioritize recovery.
However, for the sake of recovery,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 体を動かすことすら出来ずにいた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: they couldn’t even move their body.
In the corner of their vision,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 上半身だけの異形のものが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a monstrous figure, only a torso,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よちよちと姿を見せた。
そして化け物は笑い、一言だけ喋る――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And the monster smiled, speaking only one word—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: たった一言で無惨にも意識が刈り取られる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That single word cruelly shredded their consciousness.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魂が削られるような声だった。
アムがラ・バスワルドに抱えられながら
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Amu appeared, carried by La Baswald,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自分一人でもなんとか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: that you managed somehow on your own?
"I mean, if you could persuade them,
why didn’t you do it from the start!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス君が無力化したから、
私の説得が届いたのよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: my persuasion was able to reach them."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あんまり目立ちたくないの、私」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don’t really want to stand out too much."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 世界を救ったのはランス君なのよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it was Rance-kun who saved the world."
"...I feel like you’re trying to pull the wool over my eyes."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふふ、それにしても可愛い子……
アムがラ・バスワルドの頬を、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Amu gently stroked La Baswald’s cheek,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一人くらい欲しかったところなの」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I’ve always wanted at least one of."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とっとと命令なりなんなりして、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: hurry up and give some orders or whatever,
and get them back to normal."
